DOC.brief_title: Health Benefits 6-month Brisk Walking Program Sedentary Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: Community-dwelling woman age 55 recruit public meeting aim promote physical activity postmenopausal woman . Women eligible enrol study meet follow criterion : ( ) diagnose follow condition : rheumatoid arthritis , osteoarthritis , ischemic heart disease , previous joint replacement surgery cerebrovascular disease affect low limb function , malignant tumor , ( ii ) without pain medication know alter physical performance ( e.g. , corticosteroid , estrogen , statin , anti-estrogen drug ) . To recruit sample asymptomatic sedentary postmenopausal woman , woman score value 9.4 Physical Activity Questionnaire Elderly ( PAQE ) ( Serres , Gautier , Varray , & Préfaut , 1998 ) 5-minute walk distance ( 6MWD ) great than105 % predict 6MWD base Troosters ' reference equation exclude . The Troosters ' reference equation : Before enter study , woman ask provide medical certificate contraindication perform 6MWD . Women randomize either control group ( woman ask maintain lifestyle , especially physical activity habit ) exercise group . The exercise intervention consist 40 minute brisk walk 3d/wk 6 month . During 6-month program , subject require attend 2 outdoor supervise session per week , exercise 1d/wk , detail tailored program . The intensity walking adapt skilled exercise trainer individual physical capability subject . Considering theoretical maximum heart rate ( HR ) subject 208-0.7 * age ( Tanaka , Monahan , & Seals , 2001 ) , train start 40 % HR work ( difference maximum HR HR rest ) . Training intensity gradually increase finally reach 75 % HR work . Participants wear heart rate monitor ( Polar Elctro Inc , Woodbury , NY ) 3 weekly session content session collect notebook ( meter walk , duration brisk walk exercise , HR , adherence program ) . This study approve Committee Protection Human Subjects ( CPP Sud-Méditerranée III , Number : 2008.07.04 ) . All study participant provide write informed consent participate study . The objective study determine health benefit intervention program comparison control group several domain . Mesurements baseline end study comprise : - Body composition ( bone density , body lean fat mass dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) ( Hologic QDR-1500 device , Hologic , Waltham , MA , USA ) ; - The subject weigh electronic scale near 0.1 kg , height measure near 0.1 cm calculate body mass index ( BMI ) ( kg/m² ) . - Endurance training performance estimate distance walk 6-minute walk test ( 6MWT ) . The 6MWT perform accord American Thoracic Society ( 2002 ) guideline indoor corridor ( ATS , 2002 ) . - Maximum grip strength isometric maximum knee extension strength measure warm-up session , previously describe ( Blain et al. , 2010 ) . - The Diet previous 7 day use questionnaire use SUVIMAX study - Sleep quality - Depression score : French version Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) ( Beck , Steer , & Carbin , 1988 ; Cathébras , Mosnier , Lévy , Bouchou , & Rousset , 1994 ) . The BDI contains cognitive ( e.g. , pessimism , worthlessness ) physical ( e.g. , fatigue loss energy ) subscales . The BDI show sensitive exercise-induced change healthy adult ( Stein & Motta , 1992 ) . - Baseline physical activity , cover household activity , sport , leisure activity assess use PAQE ( Voorrips , Ravelli , Dongelmans , Deurenberg , & Van Staveren , 1991 ) . The activity walk outside , bicycling , heavy housework sum physical activity score ( range , 0-3 ) . Respondents participate activity give zero point , whereas three point correspond participation three activity . - Subjective health status assess follow item : In comparison people age , consider health better ( 1 ) , equal ( 2 ) , bad ( 3 ) ? . - The Tampa Scale Kinesiophobia ( TSK ) 17-item questionnaire ass fear ( ) injury due movement ( Swinkels-Meewisse , Swinkels , Verbeek , Vlaeyen , & Oostendorp , 2003 ) . Women ask make rating degree agreement 17 statement . Ratings sum yield total score high value reflect great fear ( ) injury ( French , France , Vigneau , French , & Evans , 2007 ) . - Balance assess use force platform ( Medicapteurs France SAS ) two condition test , eye open ( EO ) eye close ( EC ) , last 51.2 second separate 30-second rest period . The COP trajectory antero-posterior ( AP ) medio-lateral ( ML ) direction sample 40 Hz , leading time series length 2048 . Traditional stabilometric measure : AP ML standard deviation ( SDx SDy , mm ) , effective COP path length ( mm ) , area 90 % confidence ellipse enclose COP ( mm² ) . Complexity measure postural sway : The complexity postural sway quantify mean three measure : Percentage determinism recurrence quantification analysis ( DETRQA ) , Sample entropy ( SampEn ) , Complexity index multiscale entropy ( CIMSE ) - The adherence rate brisk walk program calculate base data record notebook ( number supervise self-reported home base walking session performed/72 session program ) . - Individual content training ( meter walk measured podometer ; total duration walking exercise , mean HR , etc… ) . - Fasted morning blood sample collect baseline end study aliquot freeze −80 °C analysis .
